Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Drummond
Reviews.Content: Small, light, fast, great finishing and not that pricy. I think Dell is still one the best PC makers, and this product honors their tradition

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Jupiter
Reviews.Content: everything as discribed. the package include ultrabook and adapterthe ultrabook is awesome, fast speed, nice appearance, and great qualitty

Reviews.Title: Good performance
Reviews.Author: Andrey
Reviews.Content: The only problem I found is that only has 2 USB ports, you have to buy many adapters for different functions.

Reviews.Title: How could I get a formal invoice ?
Reviews.Author: nickle
Reviews.Content: I bought this DELL XPE13 recently. It works well till now. But I don't know how could I get a formal invoice from dell or amazon? I can only see the informal print version of that. Does anyone has the same question? Thanks.
